mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_GROUP ( GRP_TYPE, GRP_ID, GRP_NAME, DESCRP, INS_ID, INS_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, STATUS ) VALUES ( #{type}, #{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{createdBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{modifiedBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '001' )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_GROUP SET GRP_NAME = #{name}, DESCRP = #{description}, UPD_ID = #{modifiedBy}, UPD_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE GRP_TYPE = #{type} AND GRP_ID = #{id}

UPDATE TBL_GROUP SET STATUS = #{status}, UPD_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE GRP_TYPE = #{groupType}
AND GRP_ID IN (#{groupID})
